text: While performing exploratory data analysis on a dataset, you find that an important categorical feature has 5% null values. You want to minimize the bias that could result from the missing values. How should you handle the missing values?

choices.text: Remove the rows with missing values, and upsample your dataset by 5%.
Replace the missing values with the featureâ€™s mean.
Replace the missing values with a placeholder category indicating a missing value.
Move the rows with missing values to your validation dataset.
